name: Scorbunny

evolution.description: Scorbunny can evolve into Raboot at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rabbit Pokémon. A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: While executing a move, this Pokémon's type becomes the same as that of the move and may add its STAB bonus to it.
